description: Christopher J. MacLellan joined as a co-advisor on my ongoing master's research project, which is aimed at CHI 2026.
Started as a Graduate Research Assistant at GT DILab, with a full tuition scholarship throughout Summer 2025.
Began a Data Science Internship at Tesla in Fremont, CA.
Received a full-time job offer as a Multimodal AI Researcher at LG CNS in Seoul, Korea.
Presented Workshop Paper at ACM L@S 2024.
